title: China arsenal of missiles at the ready...
text:
China 'aims 1,500 missiles at US military bases' as war boss threatens to ‘SHOOT' enemies China 'aims 1,500 missiles at US military bases' as war boss threatens to ‘SHOOT' enemies CHINA has parked an arsenal of missiles within strike range of US army bases as its war chiefs ready “military hard power” for total conflict. / Published 20th March 2017 
Military bosses from the People’s Liberation Army (PLA) are aiming the firepower at Taiwan as part of an escalating military threat to the island. 
US military bases in Okinawa are within range of the DF-16 ballistic missiles – which can hit targets with “pinpoint precision” from 1,500km away. 
Chinese defence minister Feng Shih-kuan issued the shock announcement as tensions over the disputed South China Sea territory threaten to spill over into war . 
His comments come after Taiwan revealed it has missiles capable of reaching Chinese shores last week. 
GETTY WARNING: China has ramped up its missile stock Is Trump preparing for WAR with China? US and Thai troops put on a display of power Friday, 24th February 2017 With relations between the US and China fragile, holding a joint live-fire military display with the Thai army could be seen as making things worse – especially when Trump's white supremacist Chief Advisor Steve Bannon believes America and China will be at war 'within a few years.' 1 / 16 AFP/Getty Images Thai and US military tanks participate in a live fire military display 
Speaking to lawmakers on Monday Feng said the missiles will bolster the “weapons modernization and military hard power” of China. 
The minister did not reveal how many missiles had been deployed or where. 
But Taiwan claim China is targeting the island with around 1,500 missiles. Related Articles
